movie.title: Leonard Soloway's Broadway
movie.description_intro: Through verité documentary footage, humorous storytelling, interviews and archival film material, Leonard Soloway's Broadway captures a Broadway few ever see as told through the eyes of a legendary Broadway producer you've probably never heard of. He lived an unconventional life on his own terms who, over a 70-year span, staged over 100 shows (and counting) which generated history making headlines, over 40 Tony Awards, 62 Tony Nominations, 21 Drama Desk Awards, 29 Drama Desk nominations and 3 Pulitzer Prizes in addition to launching the careers of famous stars known the world over.
movie.description_full: Through verité documentary footage, humorous storytelling, interviews and archival film material, Leonard Soloway's Broadway captures a Broadway few ever see as told through the eyes of a legendary Broadway producer you've probably never heard of. He lived an unconventional life on his own terms who, over a 70-year span, staged over 100 shows (and counting) which generated history making headlines, over 40 Tony Awards, 62 Tony Nominations, 21 Drama Desk Awards, 29 Drama Desk nominations and 3 Pulitzer Prizes in addition to launching the careers of famous stars known the world over.

movies.title: American Dream/American Knightmare
movies.summary: Special will delve deep into the life and storied exploits Suge Knight, Death Row Records co-founder, as well as the volatile and highly influential era in music that he presided over. With privileged access to those who were with Knight from the very beginning who loved, respected, feared and were inspired by him, we'll be guided through this world by the man himself. He will personally reveal exactly how it all happened, why it all fell apart, and what the next chapter holds for one of America's most iconic and mythologized figures.

movies.title: Amanda Knox
movies.summary: American exchange student Amanda Knox is convicted and eventually acquitted for the 2007 death of another student in Italy.
movies.description_full: American exchange student Amanda Knox is convicted and eventually acquitted for the 2007 death of another student in Italy.
movies.synopsis: American exchange student Amanda Knox is convicted and eventually acquitted for the 2007 death of another student in Italy.

movies.title: Out of Breath
movies.summary: In rural North Korea, a film crew follows a small group of international volunteers fighting the spread of Multidrug-resistant tuberculosis. Working with North Korean medics, the volunteers venture deep into the world's most secretive nation, overcoming cultural and political hurdles to save lives.

movies.title: Jimmy Carter: Rock & Roll President
movies.summary: Jimmy Carter's election to the presidency of the United States in 1977 was helped by the links that this fan of pop music had with stars.
